channel.title: What is your favorite armour type in RuneScape/MoparScape?
channel.description: Rune: Widley known to the RuneScape community. 40 defense required Guthix: People who want a nice armour look vote for this!!!! Zamorak: Armour for the favor of people who like nice armour trimming. Dragon: NOW WE GET TO THE GOOD STUFF! People who like a strong armour vote for this! Saradomin: Who Like's walking around with a star on their chest?

item.title: What is your favorite armour type in RuneScape/MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

MoparScape Lover22:

No problem

All those armour’s suck anyway. Plus this is a spam topic.

Read full topic

item.title: What is your favorite armour type in RuneScape/MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

[quote=“Khasck, post:2, topic:93963”]1.) dont spam
2.) wrong section, i dont think there is a section for this
3.) your forgetting ALL of the good armor, and placing ALL of the bad armor
4.) dont post waste to get your post count up please

What he/she said.

Also do you think many people here who uses MoparScape sources would be official runescape members I mean c`mon…

-Will[/quote]

Read full topic
